name: bf-only
description: VS Code formatter extension that keeps Laravel Blade templates tidy using blade-formatter

scripts.compile: npm run typecheck && npm run bundle

bfOnly.indentSize.description: Number of spaces to use when indenting Blade markup.

bfOnly.wrapLineLength.description: Wrap line length for Blade markup.

bfOnly.wrapAttributes.description: Control how HTML attributes in Blade templates are wrapped.

bfOnly.wrapAttributesMinAttrs.description: Minimum number of attributes before forcing a wrap.

bfOnly.indentInnerHtml.description: Whether to indent the head and body sections.

bfOnly.endWithNewline.description: Ensure formatted documents end with a newline.

bfOnly.endOfLine.description: End-of-line character to use when formatting.

bfOnly.useTabs.description: Use tabs instead of spaces for indentation.

bfOnly.sortTailwindcssClasses.description: Sort Tailwind CSS classes inside class attributes.

bfOnly.tailwindcssConfigPath.description: Path to a Tailwind CSS config file for class sorting.

bfOnly.sortHtmlAttributes.description: Sort HTML attributes according to a strategy.

bfOnly.customHtmlAttributesOrder.description: Custom attribute order used when sortHtmlAttributes is set to custom.

bfOnly.noPhpSyntaxCheck.description: Skip PHP syntax checking before formatting.

bfOnly.noSingleQuote.description: Use double quotes instead of single quotes inside PHP expressions.

bfOnly.noTrailingCommaPhp.description: Avoid printing trailing commas inside PHP expressions.

bfOnly.extraLiners.description: Tags that should have an extra blank line before them.

bfOnly.componentPrefix.description: Prefixes for Blade components that follow a different formatting style.

bfOnly.phpVersion.description: PHP version hint for formatting directives.

bfOnly.runtimeConfigPath.description: Explicit path to a Blade formatter config file (e.g., .bladeformatterrc).
